raw_body: RAJARATNAM-TREVOR. It is with profound sadness we announced the death of Patron and Hon. Life Member of Colombo Colts Cricket Club. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Parlour. The Funeral Service will be held on 16th February at 10.30 a.m. New Crematorium 11.30 a.m. Cremation. We kindly request all members’ presence to pay him final respect. 044360
